summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of KKNotes BSCCS application. All major features working correctly including navigation, year pages, subject management, admin functionality, mobile responsiveness, and theme consistency.
passed_tests: Home page loads with hero section and year cards (FY, SY, TY)
Navigation bar with working dropdowns for all years and semesters
Year pages display correct subjects with semester switching
Search functionality works on both year pages and subject info page
Subject table action buttons are interactive and properly styled
Subject Info page displays all 18 subjects in grid layout
Contact page form submission works with success toast notification
Footer displays correctly with visit counter (12,547)
Admin login works with credentials admin/admin123
Admin dashboard accessible with sidebar navigation
Admin feedback management displays 3 feedback entries with recontact functionality
Admin manage subjects page allows adding/editing subjects (tested with new subject)
Mobile responsive design works correctly with mobile menu
Trustworthy Blue theme consistent across all pages (blue-600, cyan-500 gradients)
All data-testid attributes present for robust testing
Toast notifications working for form submissions and admin actions
